subject: Re: Website Updates
preview: Hi Tien,  We have updated the page. https://talostone.com.au/health-and-safety-technical-data-v2  Let me know if this works for you?

full_threads.body:
Hi Tien,

We have updated the page. https://talostone.com.au/health-and-safety-technical-data-v2

Let me know if this works for you?

Hi team,

Can you please have these updated for the website.

1. https://talostone.com.au/health-and-safety-technical-data-v2
For the Natroccia Natural Stone Data Sheet labels to be changed to the image below:
See attached.
2. https://talostone.com.au/health-and-safety-technical-data-v2
For all three ranges: MinQ Zero, Natroccia and Artsense "Hazard statement"
Please update to this document.
See attached:

3. https://talostone.com.au/health-and-safety-technical-data-v2

Please
See attached.

Hi Allan,

Sure, with regards to qrcode list only accessible to specific clients. Please see below:

Once the “QR Code List For High” link is clicked, you will be redirected to new page “Natroccia - Highres Slab Images”.
  • If you are on this page “Natroccia - Highres Slab Images” and you are logged in you will be able to access the pdf.
  • If you are on this page “Natroccia - Highres Slab Images” and you are not logged you will be redirected to /my-account

Now If you want specific list of clients/users to only access the page we can create checkbox field in the user profile in the backend something like "Allow access to Natroccia - Highres Slab Images".

Let me know your thoughts?

Thank you very much, Joel. Much appreciated. Great idea to make the Natroccia Data Sheets as popup.

Just one part not done yet which is the Natroccia's hight resolution slab images QR code list per updated layout spreadsheet. Any chance this can be done and also, we would like to get an opinion from you on how to provide the access to our clients who want to view/download this list. Technically, we would like the clients to be into our database once they require the access to this file.



QR code list is located in the google drive already. How we can automatically link it to updated QR code list file as we go forward?


Best regards,



Allan



allan@talostone.com.au



02 8783 0600



0405 451 858



talostone.com.au

Hi Allan,

Thanks for sending the files.

We have updated the page. https://talostone.com.au/health-and-safety-technical-data-v2
Regarding datasheet of Natroccia we made it as a popup instead.

Let me know if this works for you and we will update the footer.

Hi Joel,

Hope you are well.

Thanks for your prompt reply. Please click below link for all the PDF files. Also, I have attached an updated layout for your information. The Green colour cell is the updated one.


drive.google.com

Techical Data & Information - Google Drive



Thanks.

Best regards,



Allan



allan@talostone.com.au



02 8783 0600



0405 451 858



talostone.com.au

We have created a new the page for you to check. Once the links are connected and you are ok with the layout we will update the footer.
